backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing user profiles, accounts, categories, and transactions with per‑principal authorization and persistent state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to source files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collected one‑line summaries of all major frontend files for documentation and build planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS theme using OKLCH variables for light and dark modes and shared UI tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, favicon, and mounting root for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app entry configuring routes, authentication gating, and theme provider before rendering routed pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Auth wrapper that waits for user profile load and triggers profile setup dialog when missing.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginScreen: Internet Identity login screen with sign‑in button, loading state, and error feedback.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting first‑time users for a display name and saving the profile via backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Catego: Computes expense totals per category and renders a color‑coded bar breakdown with percentages. Shows a placeholder card when no expense data exists.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/QuickS: Calculates total income, expenses, and net balance from transactions and displays them in three summary cards. Uses icons and conditional styling for positive or negative net.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/TopCat: Aggregates expenses to find the top five categories and shows their totals and percentage of total spending. Displays a fallback card when no expenses are present.
Provides the main layout with navigation, header, and user menu, including sign‑out handling and active‑route styling. Wraps child pages inside a consistent app shell.
frontend/src/components/transactions/Tra: Modal form for creating transactions with validation, account/category selection, and automatic income/expense amount handling. Submits via a mutation and resets state on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity, initializing access control and refetching dependent queries when the actor changes. Exposes the current actor and fetch state.
frontend/src/hooks/useFinanceQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating accounts, categories, transactions, and user profiles through the backend actor. Handles cache invalidation and actor‑dependent query enabling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, stored identity loading, and auth-client setup. Exposes a hook returning identity state and login status helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes. Applies global background, text, and border styling.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Provides currency and date formatting helpers, including user-specific currency lookup via localStorage. Falls back to USD if no stored preference exists.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider. Imports global styles and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AccountDetailPage.tsx: Renders account details, balance, and transaction list with loading and empty states. Supports adding transactions via a dialog.
frontend/src/pages/AccountsPage.tsx: Displays all accounts, total balance, and loading/empty states. Provides a dialog to create new accounts and navigation to account detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Shows categories with transaction totals for selectable date ranges. Allows creating categories and computes category totals using fetched transactions.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard showing financial overview with date‑range filtering, stats, charts, and onboarding prompts when no data exists.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Settings screen allowing users to load and save per‑identity preferences, currently supporting default currency.
frontend/src/pages/TransactionsPage.tsx: Page listing all transactions with search and filtering plus a dialog to create new transactions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup for the app.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current features, requirements, images, and planned functionality for the finance app.
